name: Xanthavia The Game
description:
XANTHAVIA THE GAME

DESCRIPTION:  Are you tired of boring platformers about a kid using bombs to get out of caves or horror games about exterminating ghosts? Well, there is a game that is sure to make it so you'll never be bored again! Introducing, XANTHAVIA THE GAME! Xanthavia The Game is in fact, the best game ever made and is made with a huge amount of love and care that most games today lack. Xanthavia The Game is, well, about... YOU! That's right, YOU are the protagonist and your job is to protect Xanthavia from all of its enemies! If you fail your task, you would fail the country and be subject to certain death. Doesn't that sound EXCITING and ANXIETY-DECREASING? What are you even waiting for? Get off of your butts and play this awesome game NOW.

GAMEPLAY/HOW TO PLAY:  Why do you need us to tell you how to play? Learn for yourself! It's the only way to get smarter, as proven by our high-class Xanthavian scientists over at Xavia INC.
